subject: Question on TestSuite()
msgSnippet: Hi all, I am new to JUnit and I ve trying to combine a sequence of testSuites. In one of my testXXX methods, I ve tried to create a TestSuite() (with a listing
messageBody:
Hi all,

I am new to JUnit and I've trying to combine a sequence of
testSuites. In one of my testXXX methods, I've tried to create a
TestSuite() (with a listing of suite.addTest(new TestSuite
(XXX.class)) ) and I want this testSuite to run its set of tests
before this particular testXXX method completes. What I've tried is:

TestSuite packageSuite = new TestSuite();
packageSuite.addTest( OtherFile.suite() );
packageSuite.runTest(packageSuite, new TestResult());

Is this right?

Ideally, I'd want the new testSuite that I've created to be inserted
into the sequence of the first initial TestSuite(). Does anybody know
how to do this?
Thanks!!
Claudio
